Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of a chelatable poly(arginyl-histidine) produced by the ergot fungus Verticillium kibiense
Literature.Author: Nishikawa M, Ogawa K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Agrobacterium tumefaciens LBA 4404(MIC=10µg/ml),Escherichia coli IFO 3301(MIC=10µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 3445(MIC=10µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium IFO 12529(MIC=10µg/ml),Bacillus cereus IFO 3514(MIC=10µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis IFO 3336(MIC=10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JCM 8726(MIC=10µg/ml),Kitasatospora kifunensis MN1(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus IFO 13276(MIC=10µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=10µg/ml)
